description.zh-CN: 径向渐变搭配极端模糊和缓慢上升的。生成烟雾视觉效果、气态大气效果和视觉神秘感。径向渐变搭配极端模糊和缓慢上升。生成美丽雾气般的大气效果。
description.en-US: Radial gradients with extreme blur and slow ascent creating beautiful misty atmospheric effects Produces dreamy, ethereal visuals through layered gradients, motion blur, and soft atmospheric perspective for contemplative, evocative experiences Creates ethereal, misty atmospheric effects Perfect for meditative applications, dreamy experiences, and atmospheric design This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. ethereal atmospheric effects and visual mystery. Delivers exceptional visual quality and sophisticated design excellence.
